# Materials

- [GLMphd](https://stat-teaching.github.io/GLMphd/) is a complete course on GLM parto of the [PhD Course in Psychological Sciences](dottorato.psy.unipd.it/en) (University of Padova).
- [General workflow for Monte Carlo Simulations](https://filippogambarota.github.io/notes/mcs-workflow/): a short blog post about a general framework to create MCS in R.
